body.p: The Python SDK may be configured using the connection string when instantiating a Bucket object.

In addition to the connection string, the Bucket object offers a few object attributes which can be used to configure settings during runtime:
timeout for key-value operation timeouts (equivalent to operation_timeout in the connection string)
views_timeout to adjust the timeout for MapReduce queries
n1ql_timeout to adjust the timeout for N1QL querties
The unsupported Bucket._cntl and Bucket._cntlstring may be used to modify additional runtime settings which do not have a native Python interface.
